mapper.sql: id, `name`, username, `password`, phone, sex, id_number, `status`, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user
mapper.insert:
insert into employee (id, `name`, username, `password`, phone, sex, id_number, `status`, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user) values
(#{item.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.username,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.phone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.sex,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.idNumber,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{item.status,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{item.createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{item.createUser,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{item.updateUser,jdbcType=BIGINT} )
